last_episode_to_air.overview: Twig Sparks turns backward lyrics into a badass dragon. A tattoo of a naked woman resembles a slice of pizza, but Miryam Lumpini's on it.

name: Tattoo Redo
overview: Bad tattoos walk in. Great tattoos walk out. Top artists transform tattoo disasters into stunning cover-ups, with designs chosen by clients' loved ones.

episodes.name: Who's Ready to See Some Bad Tattoos?
episodes.overview: Matt transforms a black blob into a bouquet, Tommy Montoya gives a raunchy quote a skull and 'shrooms redo, while Rose tackles a tribute to an ex.

episodes.name: Hot Mess, Spicy Bets
episodes.overview: Twig gives a silly chile a spicy makeover, Matt replaces Michael Jackson's glove with a rose, and Tommy vanquishes a quote from "Gladiator."

episodes.name: Let Your Freak Flag Fly
episodes.overview: Rose turns German song lyrics into a tribute to Grandma. Twig covers witchy ink with a mythical griffin, and Miryam hides a client's freaky booty tat.

episodes.name: Lions and Goats and Exes, Oh My!
episodes.overview: Tommy and Rose fix two astrological disasters: a sad Leo lion and a creepy Capricorn goat. Miryam covers an exâ€™s name with a skull.

episodes.name: Boos and Tattoos
episodes.overview: Matt Beckerich stares down a huge F-bomb, and Rose Hardy deals with some devilish ink. But how will Twig fix a lipstick that looks like a dog's penis?
